attributes.action: Create a Law Stopping Children being forced to pay adult fairs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that Children Should not have to pay adult fairs when they are not 18 (which is an adult age). EG. plane fairs, cinemas, Hotel Rooms, ECT. everything seems to stop at the age of 12 does this mean that they are an adult???
